description: This course provides a theoretical and practical foundation for assisting secondary readers. Students learn the essentials of good reading instruction and apply them in the development of a literature unit. Required 10-hour field experience. Offered annually in the first-half of the spring semester. Also counts toward linguistic studies concentration. Prerequisites: EDUC 330 or permission of instructor.
name: Teaching Reading, 5-12
notes: Open to juniors and seniors only.
Prerequisites: EDUC 330 or permission of instructor.
Meets in the first half of the semester.
prerequisites: Prerequisites: EDUC 330 or permission of instructor.
title: Teaching of Reading, 5-12
